author: Nicole Wetsman
title: Newly approved novel coronavirus test gives results in 45 minutes
description: The test runs on the biotechnology company Cepheid’s system. There are around 5,000 of the systems in hospitals in the US. The United States needs to ramp up rapid testing to bring the COVID-19 outbreak under control.
content:
But its use will be limited 
Photo by Zhang Yazi/China News Service via Getty Images
The Food and Drug Administration approved the first rapid test for the novel coronavirus over the weekend. The test, made by the biotechnology company Cepheid, returns resu… [+2271 chars]
